ygData.subject: RE: Pixie Strike broken (was Charm)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s what s broken.  It used to be that if it wasn t resisted, it worked.  None of this it isn t resisted, but it does nothing BS.  Try it on yourself
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 20 Oct 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> what is exactly wrong with it again? in the ghoul lord room last night,
> [...]
> where i was in charge of messing. it took many tries to get the bok messed,
> even though i got no resist messages, but after the first few tries once it

That's what's broken. It used to be that if it wasn't
resisted, it worked. None of this "it isn't resisted, but it
does nothing" BS. Try it on yourself a few dozen times and
you can see that it's obviously broken (icon is up but no
effect, when icon disappears you get a "you are no longer
stunned" message even though you were never stunned).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
